info.title: Microsoft MVP
info.description: The MVP Award Program is a community - and you’ve always been there for each-other! A lot of you want to help us make this community better, including creating a better experience for submitting contributions. The MVP Connector will directly enable you to use your own ideas to create and enhance your own MVP experience.
